example.eg: The meter emits a short beep every hour when functioning normally.
He opened the door to the cellar and emitted a loud scream.
They're going to issue new membership cards next month.
example.egtrans: 他们准备下个月发新会员证。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 发给, 配给, 分发

example.eg: The university issues identity cards to all its students.
example.egtrans: 这所大学向所有学生分发身份卡。

example.eg: The library issued me with a new card.
example.egtrans: 图书馆发给我一张新借书卡。

example.eg: He issued an apology for his remarks.
example.egtrans: 他为自己的言论公开道歉。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 出版, 发表, 颁布

example.eg: The ownership of the land is the main issue.
example.egtrans: 该土地的所有权是主要问题所在。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 问题, 议题, 议题

example.eg: She's concerned about the issue of work place harassment.
example.egtrans: 她很担心工作场所的骚扰问题。

example.eg: These stamps are a special coronation issue from 1953.
example.egtrans: 这些邮票是 1953 年发行的加冕礼特别版。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 发行的一套，一次发行的物品

example.eg: They printed a special issue of the book on high-quality paper.
example.egtrans: 他们用优质纸印制了这本书的特别版。

example.eg: Smoke issued from the chimney.
example.egtrans: 烟从烟囱中冒出。

example.eg: The town hall oversees the issue of liquor licenses.
example.egtrans: 市政厅监管售酒执照的发放。

example.eg: The Dead Sea is a lake with no issue.
example.egtrans: 死海是一个没有出水口的湖泊。

example.eg: They're preparing the issue of a new statement.
example.egtrans: 他们正在为新声明的发布做准备。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 发表, 发布, 公布

example.eg: All these items are ready for issue.
example.egtrans: 所有这些物品都准备好了，可以发出去了。

example.eg: The government announced a new issue of bonds.
example.egtrans: 政府宣布发行新债券。

example.eg: The board approved another issue of stock in the company.
example.egtrans: 董事会批准再次发行公司股票。

example.eg: He died without issue.
example.egtrans: 他死了，无儿无女。

example.eg: He has unresolved issues from his childhood.
example.egtrans: 他还有一些没有解决的童年遗留问题。

example.eg: They finally brought their arguments to an issue.
She suffered from an issue of blood.
example.egtrans: 她患有血漏病。

example.eg: Many problems issued from that decision.
example.egtrans: 那个决定造成了很多问题。

example.eg: A lot of profits issued from the investment.
example.egtrans: 那次投资带来了大量利润。

example.eg: The river issued into the sea.
example.egtrans: 河流入海。

example.eg: The oven issues enough heat to keep the room warm.
